scripts.format: concurrently "pnpm:format:*" && echo Please apply the diff
scripts.format:eslint: echo Fixing Lint Issues With Eslint... && pnpm eslint --ext .js --fix --quiet && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.format:prettier: echo Fixing Lint Issues With Prettier... && pnpm prettier -w . && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.format:stylelint: echo Fixing Lint Issues With Stylelint... && stylelint src/style/**/*.css --fix && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.lint:eslint: echo Linting With Eslint... &&  pnpm eslint --ext .js --quiet && echo Lint passed.|| (echo Lint failed && exit 1)
scripts.lint:prettier: echo Linting With Prettier... && pnpm prettier --check . && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed && exit 1)
scripts.lint:stylelint: echo Linting With Stylelint... && stylelint src/style/**/*.css && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed && exit 1)
scripts.lintci: concurrently "pnpm:lintci:*" && echo Please apply the following diff using git apply && git diff
scripts.lintci:eslint: echo Linting With Eslint... &&  pnpm eslint --format github --ext .js --quiet && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && pnpm eslint --ext .js --fix --quiet && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1))
scripts.lintci:prettier: echo Linting With Prettier... && pnpm prettier --check . && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && pnpm prettier -w . && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1))
scripts.lintci:stylelint: echo Linting With Stylelint... && stylelint src/style/**/*.css && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && stylelint src/style/**/*.css --fix && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1))
